My Works

Counter Strike - Global Offensive Data-Driven Stategy Analysis

Analyzed strategic grenade placement using historical matchmaking data. Created a D3.js scrollable visualization to present findings.

Project Manager - Schlumberger VR Training System (COMP 410)

Led a team of 27 students to create a cloud-hosted employee training management platform that serves virtual reality training modules and captures useful trainee analytics. Designed team workflow and worked with client to build a scalable, extensible, & secure system.

Color uniqueifyer

Analyzed strategic grenade placement using historical matchmaking data. Created a D3.js scrollable visualization to present findings.

Confusing Lepidopterologists

Trained a generative adversarial neural network to create new butterflies from historical academic illustrations.
